name: Like an Alien
description:
Join the adventure to the space with Like an Alien to discover many beautiful music planets and meet cute alien friends.
Download now to travel to the space!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Select planet you want to discover with your alien friend.
- Hold and move your alien to collect as many music notes as you can!
- Need a company? Collect the UFO so it will help you in your adventure.
- The game will speed up every moment to challenge you and your alien friends. So get ready!
- Gain points to unlock more planets and meet new alien friends.

ADDITIONAL BENEFITS:
- Chill out with easylistening and relaxing music after a hard-working day.
- Cute planets and alien friends are waiting for you to collect.

READY TO FLY? Let's back up and go to the space to meet your alien friends right away! DOWNLOAD NOW FOR FREE gameplay and cool music tunes.
